title: Print, "Pensée du Jardin du Marquis du Prié a Turin (Garden Idea for the Marquis du Prié in Turin), in Nouveaux Livre de Parterres contenant 24 pensséz diferantes (New Book Containing 24 Different Variations for Garden Beds)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: D. Marot fec:
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, upper left: Pensée du Jardin / du Marquis du Prié / a Turin du d'Esein / du Sr. D. Marot; lower right: avec Privileg:; lower right corner: 6
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Landscape architecture design for garden with fountains.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Pensée du Jardin du Marquis du Prié a Turin (Garden Idea for the Marquis du Prié in Turin), in Nouveaux Livre de Parterres contenant 24 pensséz diferantes (New Book Containing 24 Different Variations for Garden Beds)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-24.
